title: What are some names of horror films? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the type of horror you like. Personally I don't like slasher/gore; when Halloween came out, ushering in the slasher movies, I was turned off (to this day I've never seen the full Friday the 13th, Halloween, Nighmare on Elm Street- though I did see Texas Chainsaw Massacre in the mid-2000s.- it just made me sad) and I grew up on horror movies: Dracula, Zombies, Demons, etc. Today I prefer thrillers and movies that chill (ghost stories are fun)- oh, and of course those old Hammer Horror movies. Identify the genre you prefer then ask. There are thousands of titles.

Here are some of my favorite English Horror Movies from Last Few Years: The Conjuring (2013)The Conjuring 2 (2016)The Grudge (All Sequels)Final Destination (All Sequels)The Ring (2002)The Ring 2 (2005)The RingThe Omen 1976The Omen 2006 (Remade)Orphan (2009)Ouija (2014)Ouija: Origin of Evil (2016)Case 39 (2009)The Vatican Tapes (2015)The Happening (2008)Season of the Witch (2011)Insidious (2010)Insidious 2 (2013)Insidious 3 (2015)Ghost Ship (2002)Dracula (1992) (actor: Keanu Reeves)Dracula Untold (2014)28 Days Later (2002) (Zombies)28 Weeks Later (2007) (Zombies)30 Days of Night (2007) (Vampirism)World War Z (2013) (Zombies)Crimson Peak (2015)Dead Silence (2007)Friend Request (2016)Train to Busan (2016)The Unborn (2009)Unfriended (2014)The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)The Amityville Horror (2005)Incarnate (2016)Quarantine (2008) Thanks for reading - Victor_Apu.
Here ya go, knock yourself out:Lists of horror films - Wikipedia My tip: follow good horror directors over just film titles.
